## Bio
Hello! I am a raising Senior pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Statistcis & Data Science at UCLA. 

As a Statistcis & Data Science major, I am passionate about working with data and programming. I love data science and machine learning. I code in Java, C++, C#, Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, HTML & CSS. I usually use R, SQL, Tableau, and MATLAB to manipulate and analyze data. My favoriate programming language is Java.

## A little bit more about me...
My hometown is Camarillo, CA. Camarillo Premium Outlets is my favorite place there. I love traveling, snorkeling, rock climbing, wildlife rescue, and volunteering at animal shelters.
